# Sample Markdown Document

This is a sample markdown document for testing chunkers.

## Introduction

This document demonstrates various markdown features that chunkers need to handle.

### Purpose

The purpose of this document is to:
- Test heading detection
- Test section splitting
- Test metadata extraction

## Code Examples

Here is a code block:

```go
func main() {
    fmt.Println("Hello, World!")
}
```

## Lists

### Unordered List

- Item one
- Item two
- Item three

### Ordered List

1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

## Tables

| Name | Type | Description |
|------|------|-------------|
| id | int | Unique identifier |
| name | string | Display name |

## Conclusion

This concludes the sample markdown document.
